value: - either from the south (Perth), or the north (Port Hedland).

Karratha does not have a public transport system. However, taxis are available. All the major car hire companies have offices at the town's airport.

value: The 'Red Dog' statue in nearby Dampier

While Karratha has several hotels, prices are uniformly high. Some of the local mining accommodation villages also offer overnight accommodation (including meals) to tourists at relatively low, but still expensive, rates.

value: content=Featuring 60 rooms, with an outdoor pool, BBQ area and a bistro providing pleasant al fresco dining. Also features two bars, a bottle shop and a conference room. The hotel room rate includes free continental breakfast and 15 minutes free Internet access.
